name: TMDW
description:
Game crafts

To wait out the night, you may need a bonfire. 

To make it, cut down 2 trees 

And throw the resulting tree together.

You probably won't need it. 

To craft an Axe

Try to cut down a tree 

Approaching the nim with an axe, click on it to get the boards

Taking the boards in your hands, press E to craft a new axe

You can't craft more than one axe

therefore, keep an eye on the stock of boards. 

Control of the game

WASD - Character Movement 

Q - Throw the item away

E - Crafting an item with boards in hand.

______________________________________________
